en: I need to step away for a moment.
This will be my last heist.
Please don't heal me- I'm using a low health build.
I need a First Aid Kit!
Place a Suppressed Sentry Gun here!
[$USERNAME] is using Goonmod's Custom Waypoints. Syncing may be limited.
Connected to [$USERNAME]. Ready to sync waypoints.
Sending messages too fast! Please wait $COOLDOWN more seconds.
Configure settings and options (such as menu behavior).
Opens a radial menu to send messages or waypoints.
Instantly place a waypoint where you're looking.
Removes waypoints that you have placed.
While held, forces any waypoints you place to be static position only (no object markers).
While held, forces any waypoints you place to have timers.
While held, pressing a waypoint keybind will only allow you to remove your waypoint or acknowledge a teammate's waypoint.
Could not bind [$KEYNAME]: button is already bound to [$ACTION].

Awaiting keyboard input...
Press a keyboard button to bind.
OR Press [$BTN_UNBIND] to unbind.
OR Press [$BTN_CANCEL] to cancel.

Awaiting controller input...
Press a controller button to bind.
OR Press [$BTN_UNBIND] to unbind.
OR Press [$BTN_CANCEL] to cancel.
A synced voice line that plays when this option is selected.
A synced first-person arm animation that plays when this option is selected.
Synced countdown in seconds for this waypoint. Set this to 0 to disable.
The synced icon for this waypoint.
The synced text preset that will appear on this waypoint.
A pre-translated message that will be sent in chat. Other users with QuickChat will see the message in their selected language instead.
A synced marker on the HUD that shows a position, person, or object of interest, set by a player.
Play a sound whenever anyone places a new waypoint.
Play a sound whenever anyone acknowledges any waypoint.
Play a sound whenever anyone removes their waypoint acknowledgement.
Choose which sound to play for this event.
Diagnostic messages. Leave off for better performance.
Allow sending/receiving waypoints with teammates who have Goonmod's Custom Waypoints.
Show a private system notification in chat when a teammate using QuickChat joins the game.
How closely you need to aim at a waypoint to Remove or Acknowledge it.
Fades out waypoints to prevent them from cluttering the screen.
Opacity of waypoints that are faded out. Higher numbers are more visible.
The screen distance at which the waypoint begins to fade out.
For quick pings, determine the waypoint icon automatically.
Diagnostic messages for development or troubleshooting.
